titles.title: To designate the Department of Veterans Affairs hospital under construction in Aurora, Colorado, as the "Petty Officer 2nd Class Danny Dietz Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
7/16/2008--Introduced.
Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs hospital under construction on the Fitzsimons Medical Campus in Aurora, Colorado, as the "Petty Officer 2nd Class Danny Dietz Department of Veterans Affairs Hospital."
